properties.html: <style>.normalfontweight{font-weight: normal} .warning {color: #FF0000} .vform-context-label {line-height: 1.6;display: inline-block} vform-checkbox {margin-right: 10px!important} .mat-radio-label {padding-right: 10px!important} form-render .section-validation-error{margin: 0 20px; padding:0 20px; height:auto;background: transparent;} .padding-right-5px {padding-right:5px} .padding-right-10px {padding-right:10px} form-render vform-radio label{padding-right:0px} md-radio-button{;}</style>
